summary: Small mod to clean up Adrianne Avenicci\'s appearance
descriptionHtml:
After many hours leveling smithing on multiple characters I decided I did not like Adriannes dirty face and freckles. To me personally they didn\'t look right. So I made her take a shower and go over to riften to get the freckles removed at the face sculptor.....

Other changes that were made = Gave her blue eyes and made her essential so she cannot die. 

I made this mod for me but thought maybe other people would like it as well so I am uploading it here. This is also my very first mod so please take it easy on me :)

Remade the mod using creation kit. I have tested the new version in game and with TES5EDIT all seems to be in order and error free. If you download make sure to download version 2. Enjoy :)

Mods that I use that would effect my screenshots. None of these are nessesary but are recommended = 
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?
Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2-V3 Armor Replacer - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654/?
Covereyes (eyes 1) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869/?

Added screenshots with no CBBE or Covereyes.

Special thanks goes to Bethesda for this great game!
author: Vorton
